name: Richard Huang
tagline: Good quality by itself improves usage
body: # [Richard Huang](http://www.linkedin.com/in/rihuang) is a [professional](http://www.acm.org/about/se-code/) [software engineer](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software_engineer) who consistently deliver [secure](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secure_by_design), high [quality](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software_quality) product and extend its [life-cycle](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Software_development_process).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
